description:
Building a prospective list of interested clients for your business doesn't have to be a nightmare…

There's a better way than cold emailing, cold calling and other customer-acquisition methods… yet the majority of people keep on using the same techniques even though they rarely get the expected results..

Would you like to get qualified leads month-after-month on autopilot?

In this course, I want to teach you how to build a list of interested people in your products and services by using cheap laser-targeted Facebook ads and a perfect lead generation funnel. These people will not just be looking for your product or service, they will be ready to spend money with you as they come into your funnel.

Start making more money with no experience whatsoever, immediately – just like my customers grew their sales +35% each month!

No website is needed – and nothing else is required to get more leads.

You will learn how to pre-validate a potential customer so that they call you, instead of the other way around.

About this course:

  • Based on my 8+ years experience in digital marketing and growing sales online from zero to $150,000 in less than 4 months
  • Full, free lifetime access
  • Learn how to build a lead generation funnel for Any type of business
  • Regular free bonuses with case studies and examples of implemented lead generation funnels
  • All the future extra lectures are included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money back guarantee – that's my personal assurance that this course will make you more successful!

Did you know that 49% of marketers believe that improving the quality of sales leads is the most important objective, closely followed by 41% who believe boosting lead generation conversion is the 2nd objective?

Did you also know companies that excel at lead generation get 50% more paying-customers at 33% lower cost?

…that's why you need a Lead Funnel that you can create and modify easily, so you can get you more qualified leads every week!

You'll learn:

  1. How to research your audience using the latest 2015 effective tools – that top marketers use daily
  2. How to understand your market's pains and needs so that you offer them the perfect bribe or freemium
  3. What are lead magnets or bribes and why are they so important in your funnel
  4. How to build a lead generation funnel that brings you leads every month
  5. A secret way to use lead funnel one time offers, up-sells and down-sells – so you don't lose any leads that come in your system
  6. How to get high-quality free images for your Ads – no restrictions on usage
  7. How to integrate your lead generation system with Facebook ads and laser-target the right people
  8. 3 Different Lead Magnet ideas you can use today
  9. How to optimise your ads so that you improve your leads conversion rate
  10. How to vastly increase your subscribers through your funnel

I created this course because I've struggled with many client-acquisition methods that did not pay off. I have tested cold calling, cold emailing, direct mail approaches, video methods but neither of them did get me the results as this lead generation method did!

This course is perfect for you if:

  • You are a freelancer, consultant or building your small business
  • You are tired of searching for the right customers using quick-methods that don't pay off
  • You want to learn how to get more leads in your business and also provide great value to them
  • You want to win great-paying customers that will look for you and are happy to pay you fairly for your work (even high-ticket or premium services)
  • You are relying on potential customers and you're not sure if you will win the deals or not

No matter who you are, I personally guarantee that you'll learn at least five new things from this course based on my 8+ years experience and dozens of Facebook and Lead Generation campaigns!

You can have your own Lead Generation funnel up and running in 2 days, right after going through this course – and be getting more customers immediately!

I will personally respond to any questions you may have as you follow through the videos in the course! I will also update the course with more lead funnel examples that you can apply to your business!

Click the “Take This Course" button at the right top now – every hour you delay is losing you leads to your competition…

Talks soon,

Lucian Harhata
title: Supercharge Your Facebook Lead Generation
